requests.name: User Management: Add User to Site
requests.description: Add user to a site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<user name="RESTUser"
    role="Interactor"
    public="false"
    contentAdmin="false"
    supressGettingStarted="true"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Workbook Management: Query View with Preview Image
requests.description: Get a preview image of a workbook's view

requests.name: Authenticate: Sign in (As Tableau User)
requests.description: Impersonate a Tableau User
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<credentials name="russch" password="">
    	<site contentUrl="Site3" />
        <user id="4773423c-cd31-41fa-b152-6603df7ebdea"/>
      </credentials>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Sites: Query Site
requests.description: Query Tableau Site by Name

requests.name: Workbook Management: Add Workbook to Favorites
requests.description: Add a workbook to the favorites list of a user
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <favorite label="I was Favorited by REST"> 
    <workbook id="efbbe45a-89ec-11e3-8e3a-1bae9933f8ef" /> 
  </favorite> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Projects: Update Project
requests.description: Update an existing project in a specific site
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <project description="A new project created with the REST API which has been UPDATED" /> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Workbook Management: Add Tags to a Workbook
requests.description: Add one or more tags to a workbook
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <workbook id="efbbe45a-89ec-11e3-8e3a-1bae9933f8ef">
    <tags> 
      <tag label="Tagged by the REST API" /> 
      <tag label="tag2" />
    </tags> 
  </workbook> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Authenticate: Sign-in (As an Admin)
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<credentials name="russch" password="">
    	<site contentUrl="" />
      </credentials>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Sites: Delete Site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<site name="russell"
    contentUrl="russellSite"
    adminMode="ContentAndUsers"
    userQuota="10"
    storageQuota="40"
  disableSubscriptions="false"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: User Management: Remove User from Site
requests.description: Remove a specific user from a site

requests.name: Workbook Management: Delete Tag from a Workbook
requests.description: Delete a tag from the specified workbook
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <workbook id="efbbe45a-89ec-11e3-8e3a-1bae9933f8ef">
    <tags> 
      <tag label="Tagged by the REST API" /> 
      <tag label="tag2" />
    </tags> 
  </workbook> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Workbook Management: Query Workbook with a Preview Image
requests.description: Get the details of a specific workbook, including a preview image.
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <workbook id="efbbe45a-89ec-11e3-8e3a-1bae9933f8ef">
    <tags> 
      <tag label="Tagged by the REST API" /> 
      <tag label="tag2" />
    </tags> 
  </workbook> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Projects: Delete Project
requests.description: Delete a project

requests.name: Workbook Management: Delete Workbook from Favorites
requests.description: Delete a workbook to the favorites list of a user

requests.name: User Management: Get Users On Site
requests.description: Get all users in site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<user name="RESTUser"
    role="Interactor"
    public="false"
    contentAdmin="false"
    supressGettingStarted="true"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Datasources: Query Datasources
requests.description: Query all data sources in the site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<site name="russell"
    contentUrl="russellSite"
    adminMode="ContentAndUsers"
    userQuota="11"
    state="active"
    statusReason="Update"
    storageQuota="40"
  disableSubscriptions="false"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: User Management: Get Users on Site
requests.description: List all the users is a specific site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<user name="RESTUser"
    role="Interactor"
    public="false"
    contentAdmin="false"
    supressGettingStarted="true"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Sites: Create Site
requests.description: Create a new site
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<site name="russell"
    contentUrl="russellSite"
    adminMode="ContentAndUsers"
    userQuota="10"
    storageQuota="40"
  disableSubscriptions="false"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Workbook Management: Query Workbook
requests.description: Get the details of a specific workbok
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <workbook id="efbbe45a-89ec-11e3-8e3a-1bae9933f8ef">
    <tags> 
      <tag label="Tagged by the REST API" /> 
      <tag label="tag2" />
    </tags> 
  </workbook> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Sites: Site Information Including Storage
requests.description: View information (including storage info) about a site - similar to Query Site but with more stuff.
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<site name="Updated Site Name"
    storageQuota="40"
  disableSubscriptions="false"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Workbook Management: Query Views for a Workbook
requests.description: Get a list of views in a Workbook

requests.name: Datasources: Query Datasource
requests.description: Query a specific data source
requests.data:
<tsRequest>
	<site name="russell"
    contentUrl="russellSite"
    adminMode="ContentAndUsers"
    userQuota="11"
    state="active"
    statusReason="Update"
    storageQuota="40"
  disableSubscriptions="false"/>
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Projects: Create Project
requests.description: Create a new project in a specific site
requests.data:
<tsRequest> 
  <project name="Hello World"  
    description="A new project created with the REST API" /> 
</tsRequest>

requests.name: Authenticate: Sign Out
